headline: Brown & Brown, Inc. (BRO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Brown & Brown, Inc. on FlueintinQuality’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BRO. Brown & Brown, Inc.’s share was trading at $91.37 as of July 31st. BRO’s trailing and forward P/E were 26.33 and 21.60, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Brown & Brown (BRO) is […]
